H0.text: In beach volleyball and indoor volleyball, what is the maximum number of contacts that a team can have with the ball before it crosses the net. 1

H1.text: In beach volleyball and indoor volleyball, what is the maximum number of contacts that a team can have with the ball before it crosses the net. 2

H2.text: In beach volleyball and indoor volleyball, what is the maximum number of contacts that a team can have with the ball before it crosses the net. 4

H3.text: In beach volleyball and indoor volleyball, what is the maximum number of contacts that a team can have with the ball before it crosses the net. 3

A4.text: The opposing team must use no more than three contacts to return the ball over the net.

A5.text: A team committing four consecutive contacts with the ball is considered a fault.
